To

_______________________


Job Number:{{ doc.name }}

Dear Customer,
Thanks for providing opportunity to serve you. You have requested to conduct following test: {{ doc.name_on_the_test_report}}Your expected date of completion of test and test report is {{ doc.date_of_test_report }}. Please always quote your JOB NUMBER for inquiry.



Terms and Conditions:

1. 100% payment in advance with work order.

2. Destroyed material shall be immediately disposed after completion, if not requested to preserve.

3. Payment shall be made in Cash/ Cheque with MICR code only and payable at Nashik,

4. GST 18% extra shall be paid separately.

5. Duplicate copy of test report shall be available at additional charges.

6. All the legal court matters will be subjected to Nashik jurisdiction only.

7. For NABL certified test, extra sample shall be preserved for 1 month.

8. If test report delivery is required, additional charges of postage to be paid separately.

9. Report results shall not be disclosed on the Phone/Mobile.



Authorised Signatory for Civil Tech




{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
name: Work order Master
